title: Spacebar96
author: Spacebar96
content: Good so far, These are the world cup players in Qatar with the highest ratings.Bruno FernandesLionel MessiWojciech SzczesnyKylian mbappeCody GakpaAntoine GriezmannDiogo DalotJean-charles CastellettoJoshua KimmichMohammed Kudus

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: The Portuguese striker Gomes looks good, he took the place of Ronaldo & actually scored three in the last 16 game. Alisson Becker has only conceded one goal also, the Brazil defence is amazing also. Jude Bellingham the midfielder with England looks to be a superstar & only 19 years of age. The 1/4 final games should be very entertaining.
